Record.ClassificationPath: Chemicals_and_Drugs_Kind/Drug, Food, Chemical or Biomedical Material/Dietary Supplement/Lactobacillus Fermented Extract
Record.BroaderTerm: Drug, Food, Chemical or Biomedical Material
Record.Description: A proprietary dietary supplement. Lactobacillus fermented extract is made from soymilk fermented by several strains of lactobacillus and yeast via a symbiotic co-culturing technology. The composition of the agent includes amino acids, vitamins, minerals, fatty acids, isoflavones, and saponins. Lactobacillus fermented extract may support healthy intestinal function.
